title: Ritualist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, curse a player. If they die tonight, their role and last will will not be revealed to anyone except you.
- At night, give your target player a false message that they were healed that night. You have 3 uses of this ability.
- At night, make a Cult member appear as Town to any investigative roles. You have 2 uses of this ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role is converted from Town Support members who are not roleblock or redirect immune.
- If you are sacrificed, the Cult Leader will gain 3 charges of their double attack ability rather than 2.

desc:
Post 965
*In another time, you would be upset at how your powers are being abused for “evil”. Now, however, you know you are not evil. You are merely…enlightened.*

You may only perform one ability per phase.
